description: Test file for the api/http module in the travel planner front-end project. Contains unit tests verifying authentication session management, HTTP request behavior, and error handling using Jest framework.

methods.name: clearAuthSession
methods.description: Clears stored authentication tokens and user info from local storage.

methods.name: getAccessToken
methods.description: Retrieves the access token from local storage.

methods.name: getStoredUser
methods.description: Retrieves stored user information from local storage.

methods.name: httpRequest
methods.description: Performs an HTTP request with optional authentication, handles JSON responses and errors.

methods.name: onUnauthorized
methods.description: Registers a listener for 401 Unauthorized responses to clear session.

methods.name: setAuthSession
methods.description: Stores authentication session data such as access token and user info.
